metadata.title: CVE-2014-3876 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Frams' Fast FileEXchange (F*EX, aka fex) before fex-20140530 allow remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) akey parameter to rup or(2) disclaimer or (3) gm parameter to fuc.

criterions.comment: fex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
